name: One Power Source
description:
This game consists of a group of robots that have to survive to many angry tanks.

You only have one power source for your 4 robots so you´ll have to pass the power source between them to survive. All the robots have the same connected lifes so if one gets damaged the others will get damaged too.

Every robot can only move in their square but they can shoot any kind of bullet through the holes.

CONTROLS:

W A S D: Movement

Left Mouse Button: Shoot(bullets will bounce once off walls)

Right Mouse Button: Shoot the power source(you will not be able to move any of the robots if the power source is bouncing around)

Have fun!
